name: React Components
tagline: A big list of react components I use often or like a lot
body:
##Components
### Drag & Drop
* [react-dropzone](http://okonet.ru/react-dropzone/) : Simple HTML5 drag-drop zone with React.js.
* [React DnD](http://gaearon.github.io/react-dnd/) : Drag and Drop for React

### Input
* [Draft.js](http://facebook.github.io/draft-js/) : RICH TEXT EDITOR FRAMEWORK FOR REACT
* [Select2](https://github.com/rkit/react-select2-wrapper) : Select2 gives you a customizable select box

## Extra
### React UI
* [Pure UI](http://rauchg.com/2015/pure-ui/) : How to design a good UI component with React

### Redux tutorials
* [Redux basics](http://rauchg.com/2015/pure-ui/) :https://egghead.io/lessons/javascript-redux-the-single-immutable-state-tree
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
